channel.title: Treasure on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Treasure on Homepage

item.title: Secret Treasure
item.description: <p>Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they <em>get you</em>.</p>
item.content:encoded: <p>Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they <em>get you</em>.</p>
